NoseSigns.modality: Worse in morning, in warm room
NoseSigns.notes: Thick, stringy or mucopurulent nasal catarrh seen in sinusitis or chronic rhinitis. Kali bich and Hydrastis are key remedies.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in open air, evening, spring
NoseSigns.notes: Common cold or hay fever with burning watery coryza. Allium cepa affects eyes and nose together.

NoseSigns.rubric: Nose - Obstruction, can’t breathe through nose
NoseSigns.modality: Worse at night, during sleep, in children
NoseSigns.notes: Nasal blockage due to polyps, turbinate swelling, or allergic rhinitis. Sambucus especially in infants.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse during fever, in summer, after exertion
NoseSigns.notes: Bleeding from nose, especially in anaemia, typhoid, or trauma. Hamamelis and Phosphorus help in passive bleeding.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in dry rooms, early morning
NoseSigns.notes: Dry, bloody crusts inside nose; Kali bichromicum is a top remedy. Graphites when crusts alternate with skin eruptions.

NoseSigns.modality: After cold, sinusitis, or nasal polyps
NoseSigns.notes: Anosmia after prolonged catarrh, polyp, or COVID. Kali bich and Natrum mur are commonly indicated.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in morning, spring, allergic weather
NoseSigns.notes: Allergic rhinitis or hay fever; sneezing bouts often accompanied by acrid coryza.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in morning, in warm room
NoseSigns.notes: Thick, stringy or mucopurulent nasal catarrh seen in sinusitis or chronic rhinitis. Kali bich and Hydrastis are key remedies.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in open air, evening, spring
NoseSigns.notes: Common cold or hay fever with burning watery coryza. Allium cepa affects eyes and nose together.

NoseSigns.rubric: Nose - Obstruction, can’t breathe through nose
NoseSigns.modality: Worse at night, during sleep, in children
NoseSigns.notes: Nasal blockage due to polyps, turbinate swelling, or allergic rhinitis. Sambucus especially in infants.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse during fever, in summer, after exertion
NoseSigns.notes: Bleeding from nose, especially in anaemia, typhoid, or trauma. Hamamelis and Phosphorus help in passive bleeding.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in dry rooms, early morning
NoseSigns.notes: Dry, bloody crusts inside nose; Kali bichromicum is a top remedy. Graphites when crusts alternate with skin eruptions.

NoseSigns.modality: After cold, sinusitis, or nasal polyps
NoseSigns.notes: Anosmia after prolonged catarrh, polyp, or COVID. Kali bich and Natrum mur are commonly indicated.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in morning, spring, allergic weather
NoseSigns.notes: Allergic rhinitis or hay fever; sneezing bouts often accompanied by acrid coryza.

NoseSigns.modality: During boredom, stress, or in children
NoseSigns.notes: Obsessive-compulsive nose picking, seen in restless or destructive children. Tuberculinum and Veratrum are commonly indicated.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse at night or during delirium
NoseSigns.notes: Perceiving non-existent bad smells; seen in hysteria, psychosis, or high fevers. Anacardium and Kali bromatum are classic choices.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in damp weather, lying down
NoseSigns.notes: Obstructive nasal polyps with loss of smell or post-nasal dripping. Lemna minor and Teucrium marum are polyp-specific.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse at night, chronic nasal blockage
NoseSigns.notes: Chronic obstruction due to DNS; Silicea and Kali sulph assist in mucosal healing and ventilation.

NoseSigns.rubric: Nose - Enlarged adenoids, mouth breathing in children
NoseSigns.modality: Worse during sleep, with snoring
NoseSigns.notes: Enlarged adenoids causing nasal speech, open-mouth sleep, or ear issues. Agraphis nutans and Calcarea phosphorica are well-indicated.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse in cold/damp, better with warmth
NoseSigns.notes: Facial pain, post-nasal drip, thick discharge. Kali bichromicum and Hydrastis work well in chronic sinusitis.

NoseSigns.modality: Worse from dust, allergies, cold air
NoseSigns.notes: Burning, stinging sensation in nostrils during colds or allergic rhinitis. Arsenicum and Allium cepa often selected.
